name: Space Girl Thibi Feed Me
description:
Important: The highscores in the WebGL version of the game are currently not functional, sorry. Please download the Windows version to get your scores onto the leaderboards!

Also Important: Please ensure your browser's zoom is set to 100% or some multiple of that to get the best graphics experience. Otherwise, the pixel art will be distorted. Thank you!

Controls
  • A/D, ←/→, or Left stick: Move
  • W, ↑, Space, or Ⓐ/Button south: Jump

Jump while walking up sloped tiles to get a boost in your jump.

Objective

You are Thibi, a space girl who has a pet alien that needs to consume fruit and gems constantly. Grab the items and feed them to him before he looses health! However, he will only consume food items of the type that he is currently requesting.

Details
  • Engine: Unity 2019.3.10f1
  • Source-code editor: Microsoft Visual Studio 2019
  • Graphics editor: Aseprite
  • SFX editor: SFXR/BFXR
  • Music editor: FL Studio
